phrases.phrase: Facebook Module
<title>Facebook Connect</title><info>Facebook Connect</info>
<title>Facebook API Key</title><info>Provide the API Key for your Facebook application.</info>
<title>Facebook Secret</title><info>Provide the secret key for your Facebook application.</info>
Set this to True to enable Facebook connect.
Please hold while you are redirected...
<title>Application ID</title><info>Provide the Application ID for your Facebook application.</info>
Facebook Connect
The email you have associated with Facebook is already in use on our website and cannot be used with this account.
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Blogs)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Photo)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Video)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Groups)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Events)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
<title>Enable Facebook Like Button (Marketplace)</title><info>Enable to use the Facebook Like Button feature.</info>
Sincronizza con Facebook
Please take a moment to sync your Facebook account with our community.
o accedi tramite Facebook:
Facebook Connect Account Issues
We already have an account created with us with the same email you have on Facebook. Would you like to sync both accounts?
Note that if you sync both accounts you will not be able to use the original account here other then logging in with Facebook Connect.
Sì, sincronizza entrambi gli account.
No, do not sync both accounts.
You have chosen to not sync both accounts. To complete this process please remove this Facebook Connection here:
Impossibile collegarsi da Facebook.
Unable to fetch your Facebook account.
Unable to fetch your full name from Facebook.
Il tuo account è collegato a quello di Facebook. Per favore accedi tramite Facebook
Fa cagare!
